mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contacts (user_id, name, email, message, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{email}, #{message}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS id, c.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, u.login_id AS loginId, c.name AS name, c.email AS email, c.message AS message, c.created_at AS createdAt FROM contacts c LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = c.user_id ORDER BY c.id DESC
